description: Meta info coming from NOMAD repository, describing properties of the upload

metaInfos.name: section_repository_info
metaInfos.description: Section containing information about the original upload to NOMAD repository

metaInfos.name: section_uploader
metaInfos.description: Information about the person who uploaded the data to NOMAD repository

metaInfos.name: uploader_first_name
metaInfos.description: First name of the uploader to NOMAD repository (includes middle names)

metaInfos.name: uploader_last_name
metaInfos.description: Last name of the uploader to NOMAD repository

metaInfos.name: section_coauthor_info
metaInfos.description: Information about the coauthors of data uploaded to NOMAD repository

metaInfos.name: coauthor_first_name
metaInfos.description: First name of a coauthor of NOMAD repository data (includes middle names)

metaInfos.name: coauthor_last_name
metaInfos.description: Last name of a coauthor to NOMAD repository data

metaInfos.name: upload_comment
metaInfos.description: Comment on data uploaded to NOMAD repository

metaInfos.name: upload_date
metaInfos.description: Date/time when the data was uploaded to NOMAD repository (offset from *Unix epoch* (00:00:00 UTC on 1 January 1970) in seconds)
